name: Flycatching
description:
You've dragged your two friends along on a visit to a remote resort, but you're really having second thoughts about this now.  You should probably leave now, but where's the fun in that?

A choose-your-own-adventure style game with 5 endings and quite a few branching pathways! Reader beware: disturbing imagery/implications run rampant in this story. Tread with caution!
